overview: An impressive choreography, which is underlined by wonderful music - this front runner of the classical repertoire has it all!  Prince Siegfried is asked by his parents to choose a bride. However, at the lake he meets the mysterious swan woman Odette and is fascinated by her. When he expresses his eternal love for her in a vow, it has unstoppable consequences.
title: Bolschoi Ballett: Schwanensee
